mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, u.dept_id, u.email, u.mobile, u.is_active, u.gender, ur.role_id from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id where u.id = #{userId}

SELECT u.username, u.id, d.name as dept_name, u.mobile, u.email, u.avatar, u.remark, u.gender, u.dept_id as dept_id, group_concat(r.name) AS role_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} GROUP BY u.username, d.dept_name, u.mobile, u.email, u.avatar, u.description, u.gender, u.id, u.dept_id
